feels.name: Despair
feels.quote: Wet, drenched through, and shivering cold, despairing of ship or boat, we lifted up our eyes as the dawn came on.

feels.name: Hopelessness
feels.quote: There, then, he sat, holding up that imbecile candle in the heart of that almighty forlornness.

causedBy.name: Holding up a candle in despair

feels.name: Fear
feels.quote: The whole crew were half suffocated as they were tossed helter-skelter into the white curdling cream of the squall.

hasObject.name: White curdling cream of the squall

feels.name: Amusement
feels.quote: Ha, ha! the whale would give them squint for squint, mind that!

causedBy.name: Discussing the law in the fishery

feels.name: Humor
feels.quote: Ha, ha! the whale would give them squint for squint, mind that!

causedBy.name: Discussing the law in the fishery
